Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, donnager fan said:

After some testing, I have come to the conclusion that the mod NEEDS RO to work, Which is a shame because i don't really use RO alot, but nerveless great mod!

What about people who want to go interstellar into other solar systems with Buran Energia? or is RO compatible with Galaxies unbound and life support mods and interstellar extended and the tons of other mods I installed?
Is it possible that you would add support for stock? If no, can I make configs for myself?

On 11/2/2022 at 8:53 PM, eagleswing12 said:

Is it possible that you would add support for stock? If no, can I make configs for myself?

Go ahead if you want to make configs. If you want to share,  I can include them with the mod.
There is a problem, KSP says that parts are incompartible with RO, is it OK?
can you size-down this mod to make it work for stock?

KSP Realism Overhaul (and other mods like RO Engines, RO Tanks, RealFuels) were updated, which switched the RD-170's fuels from Kerosene/LOX to RP-1/LOX. I tried using the mod after RO v16.1.0 and the tanks meant for the RD-170 do not have RP-1/LOX as an option. So, yes, just a heads up.

 

EDIT: Nevermind, there was a hotfix for RO that fixed this.

Edited June 11, 2023 by g600
New developments
Is this mod compatible with the B9 part switch mod?

11 minutes ago, TRDP said:

Is this mod compatible with the B9 part switch mod?

No need for B9 compatibility because there are no other textures or designs which can be switch.

I have one very interesting idea using this buran energia craft in normal KSP. while in realism the full tank will be required for getting it to orbit but in the case of normal ksp we will have quite a lot of fuel left. what if instead of filling up the core stage with fuel completely we reserve some space on the top, just enough to allow energia to take itself,buran and this space which will have cargo to orbit. This cargo will have a interplanetary transfer stage which can be attached to the buran with a docking port on the back. Say we use the interstellar engine mods then we can use the vasimr, nerva and direct cycle nuclear turbojets instead of the normal engines. the nerva will be available in the interplanetary transfer stage, nerva and nuclear turbojets will be used instead of RD 58 and a jet engine. We could maybe theoretically take this thing to mars and back.

Just a idea i wanted to share after watching far too many awesome buran energia launches on youtube.

Thank You
